snippet.title: Friday Night Funkin' VS Random Wees: Dave & Bambi Extended | Animatronic BF & GF (FNF MOD/FNAF)
snippet.description:
Friday Night Funkin' VS Random Wees: Dave & Bambi Extended (FULL WEEK) for the PC in 2160p Ultra HD. This time play a Dave & Bambi fanmade mod & also has Animatronic BF & GF (FNAF). 
Sanco - FNF RANDOM STUIOS: https://twitter.com/RandomWees

This is a Dave & Bambi fanmade mod and not ociated with the Dave & Bambi 3.0, in this mod we battle Dave, Bambi and a few other new characters including Animatronic BF & GF from Five Night At Funkin'? Or is it Funkin Night At Freddy’s? The mod has 14 songs or 15 if you count the secret cheating song. I'll be playing it on very hard mode for all VS Random Wees: Dave & Bambi Extended songs. Will Boyfriend & Girlfriend defeat these new foes or will BF & GF lose to DNB? 

(The game lags if you miss, I disabled missed sound effects so the music plays perfectly) 

Dave's origin was from a mod of Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning called Dave's Fun Algebra Cl.

Vs. RANDOM WEES DAVE & BAMBI EXTENDED Mod Download:
https://gamebanana.com/mods/432177

Game Note: This is just an extension of random wees, specifically from Dave & Bambi

All Songs from Friday Night Funkin' VS Random Wees: Dave & Bambi Extended Timestamp:
00:00 Animation Preview
00:47 Title Screen
01:08 Menu
01:20 Week List
01:28 Dialogue 1
01:55 1) Driverd Song (Dave vs BF)
03:22 Jose Sings
04:33 Dialogue 2
04:52 2) Drumped Out Song (Tristan vs BF)
07:26 Dialogue 3
07:36 3) Three-Dimensional Wandering Song (Dave 3D vs BF 3D)
11:10 Dialogue 4
11:27 4) Crap Song (Bambi vs BF)
13:15 Bambi pulls out the banjo
13:59 Dialogue 5
14:05 5) Fram Staler Song  (Bambi vs BF)
15:57 Jose takes his place
17:06 6) Rage Road Down Song (Bambi 3D vs Jose w/ BF & GF)
21:50 Freeplay
22:06 7) Taboocorn Song (Ibmab w/ BF vs Bambi)
25:47 8) Pros Purgatory Song  (Against Pro)
28:57 Super spam attack
29:44 9) Fur Friends Song (Sanco vs Bandu Furry w/ Ayma)
33:30 Just sounds cool
33:58 10) Houstyle Song (Minus Dave vs Minus BF w/ GF)
34:23 Dave talks
35:17 Dave talks 2
36:34 You beat me
36:45 11) Street Magic Song (Bobi vs BF)
38:10 Clown appears
39:28 12) Anomalie V Song (Vicente vs BF)
43:19 13) Funky Night Song (Security Guard Dave vs Animatronic BF)
45:10 Animatronic GF appears
45:32 Animatronic BF buts in
45:50 Jumpscare 1
46:30 End & Jumpscare 2
46:58 14) NG Soul Song  (Against NG/Newgrounds Soul)
49:49 Pressing 7, He hates cheaters
49:54 15) 7 Key Song (Expunged vs BF)
51:58 End
52:10 Credit
52:28 Gallery (Animatronic GF / BF & More)
54:44 Outro - CommunityGame

Mod Creators for VS Random Wees: Dave & Bambi Extended below 
VS Random Wees: Dave & Bambi Extended FULL WEEK (Cutscenes!) DL: 
https://gamebanana.com/mods/432177
Sanco the fox - artist, composer, charter and mod director:
https://twitter.com/RandomWees
juani clowny rabbit - artist and animator:
https://gamebanana.com/members/2107463
Brick boy - artist and animator:
https://twitter.com/BrickBoydaidiot
LilyUwU - BG artist:
https://gamebanana.com/members/1985582
arten - BG artist:
https://twitter.com/Artenkk
THE BIG BOSS lmao - cool coder:
https://gamebanana.com/members/2085125

-------------------
MoldyGH - Dave and Bambi Creator:
https://www.youtube.com/c/MoldyGH

Get the game and support the creators of the game:
https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/funkin/friday-night-funkin-the-full--game

https://youtu.be/XPM7uvJzSfw
Friday Night Funkin' VS Dave & Bambi Golden Apple Edition 1.2 Ferocious 
https://youtu.be/QfRTiJc53JE
